comment: ɗan'uwa = male kinsman on G0 who is not a cross cousin.
yaruwa = female G0 relation who is not a cross cousin.
disagreement of sources. Bakori 2017 puts gwaggo as a paternal, not maternal aunt. Says maternal aunt = inna)
